entry.title: Stealth Addresses
entry.summary: In this context, a discussion is taking place between two individuals regarding the implementation of the stealth payment protocol in Bitcoin. The conversation revolves around the use of a master shared secret to derive per-pubkey secrets. One individual suggests adding a counter to the hash function to fix the issue of not being entirely stealth, which the other agrees with. They then discuss the use of multi-sig and P2SH outputs for better anonymity and compatibility with other wallets. Finally, the conversation ends with a signature file attached to the email.
